price: 20. gexsô marak Nabii Yuusuf qeelak yeyyeeqe num kee kay kataysis melleb как boolale lakqoy dagoy loowintah kaa xaamen, kaak yamurruqeeninkeh, usun kaxxa sangel kaah Íe marah suge weenimih sabbatah.
arabic: وَشَرَوۡهُ بِثَمَنِۭ بَخۡسٖ دَرَٰهِمَ مَعۡدُودَةٖ وَكَانُواْ فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلزَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: washarawhu bithamanin bakhsin darāhima maʿdūdatin wakānū fīhi mina al-zāhidīna
